questions.title: Basic movement
questions.description:
Your friend has spawned.
But he can't move because there isn't a MovementController object initialized.
questions.question: Complete the line with the correct initilization of the MovementController object. The MovementController takes as parameter a player object that it will control.
questions.correctText: Good job, your friend can move now!

answers.hint: The move variable doesn't get any value.
Invalid value set for variable move.
MovementController takes a Player object as parameter.

questions.title: Jumping
questions.description: Johnny can move now, but he can't jump just yet. He has a boolean attribute called canJump but it isn't set to true when he initializes.
questions.question: Where should you set the canJump attribute to true so he can jump after initializing?
questions.correctText: Nicely done! Johnny can jump now!

answers.value: In a new method called setSpawn(), that you call from Main.
answers.hint: That works, but if you forget to call it from Main he can't jump.

answers.value: In the constructor of the Player object.
